result.eng: They went on a visit to Rome.
result.ga: Chuaigh siad ar cuairt go dtí an Róimh
result.orig: Chuaigh siad ar cuairt go dtí an Róimh
result.html: Chuaigh siad ar cuairt go dtí an RóimhThey went on a visit to Rome.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ siad ar cuairt go dtí an RóiṁThey went on a visit to Rome.

result.eng: He visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ga: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé cuairt ar a ċlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.

result.eng: Visit me when you're in the country.
result.ga: Tabhair cuairt orm nuair a bheidh tú sa tír
result.orig: Tabhair cuairt orm nuair a bheidh tú sa tír
result.html: Tabhair cuairt orm nuair a bheidh tú sa tírVisit me when you're in the country.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair cuairt orm nuair a ḃeiḋ tú sa tírVisit me when you're in the country.

result.eng: I visited my aunt in New York.
result.ga: Thug mé cuairt ar m'aintín i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Thug mé cuairt ar m'aintín i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Thug mé cuairt ar m'aintín i Nua-EabhracI visited my aunt in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cuairt ar m'aintín i Nua-EaḃracI visited my aunt in New York.

result.eng: She came over for a visit.
result.html: Tháinig sí anall ar cuairtShe came over for a visit.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sí anall ar cuairtShe came over for a visit.

result.eng: I was in Boston visiting my uncle and my aunt.
result.ga: Bhí mé i mBostún ar cuairt ag m'uncail agus m'aintín
result.orig: Bhí mé i mBostún ar cuairt ag m'uncail agus m'aintín
result.html: Bhí mé i mBostún ar cuairt ag m'uncail agus m'aintínI was in Boston visiting my uncle and my aunt.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé i mBostún ar cuairt ag m'uncail agus m'aintínI was in Boston visiting my uncle and my aunt.

result.eng: I visited the city in the eighties.
result.ga: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidí
result.orig: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidí
result.html: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidíI visited the city in the eighties.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cuairt ar an ċaṫair sna hoċtóidíI visited the city in the eighties.
